A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a disappointing movie... In the force awakens\, they led the audience in a very specific mysterious direction. Just to shit all over it in the last Jedi. The decisions they made and the explanations they gave for certain characters was such a let down. I left the theatre scratching my head and completely disappointed with Disney’s and Rian Johnson’s version of the story. They completely botched Luke’s character and turned him into the opposite of what he was in the original trilogy. Just overall flabbergasted by this movie.
